name: The Vexi Platform

screenshots.caption: Vexitrs - a tetris clone created with Vexi

short_description: Vexi is a rich GUI platform for creating desktop-like Internet or intranet applications using an intuitive XML/JavaScript API and an extensible widget set with themes, JSON support. Communicate with servers using XMLRPC/SOAP/REST and runs on Java.
